document.full_text: an evangelist who is serving a prison sentence for taking young girls across state lines for sex was ordered to pay members of his ministry $30 million for ordering them to be beaten.
document.title: south: arkansas: evangelist loses suit over beating order
lines_and_colors: an evangelist who is serving a prison sentence for taking young girls across state lines for sex was ordered to pay members of his ministry $30 million for ordering them to be beaten.
